item.title: Crazy golf test hits Dubai
item.description: Crazy golf test makes Dubai splash
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> It's a par three, but not as we know it. A full 100 meters above sea level on the 22nd floor of the Atlantis Hotel, a clutch of the world's top golfers were set the challenge of hitting a tiny green in the ocean as part of the build up to the European Tour's 2013 finale in Dubai.
